name: redprint-forge
description: A developer-friendly framework/library in solidity to modify & deploy OPStack â€™s contracts in a modular style.

scripts.postinstall: forge install --no-git openzeppelin-4_9_4=openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.9.4 openzeppelin-upgradeable-4_9_4=OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable@v4.9.4 foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.9.1 safe-global/safe-smart-account@v1.4.1 ethereum-optimism/lib-keccak || echo ''
scripts.prepare: rm -rf lib/ && set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git openzeppelin-4_9_4=openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.9.4 openzeppelin-upgradeable-4_9_4=OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable@v4.9.4 foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.9.1 safe-global/safe-smart-account@v1.4.1 || echo ''
